title: Jalapeno Popper Pigs in a Blanket

Ingredients.1: 2 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent roll dough

Ingredients.4: 0.5 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Unwrap crescent dough and separate into 12 triangles onto a clean work surface. Spread 1 to 2 tablespoons cream cheese into each jalapeno half and press a sausage half into the mixture. Place stuffed jalapenos on top of the crescent triangles and sprinkle with 1 to 2 tablespoons Cheddar cheese. Wrap stuffed jalapeno with crescent dough.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until dough has puffed up and is lightly browned, about 15 minutes.
